=======
History
=======

0.9.2 (2019-02-06)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.


0.9.4 (2019-02-20)
------------------

* Full suite of tests added, bugs uncovered and fixed
* Adjustments to the packaging setup -- actaully installable now


0.9.5 (2019-02-25)
------------------

* Adding support for RNA splice site detection and removal
